title: [FEA] Nth element support in dask cudf
body:
Requesting `nth` support in dask cudf after groupby.
ex. 
```
from cudf import DataFrame
import dask_cudf
df = DataFrame()
df['key'] = [1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2]
df['val_0']= [13, 15, 20, 27, 60, 17, 90]
df['val_1'] = [5, 1, 4, 9, 2, 7, 8]
meta_format = DataFrame()
ddf = dask_cudf.from_cudf(df, npartitions=1)
groups = ddf.groupby(['key']).nth(0)
```
